Params: {3: 'The library, once a symbol of civilization, now welcomes unwelcome guests.'}
{3: "The agent's golden eyes are betraying the insincerity of his words."}
{2: 'What a coincidence.', 3: '8', 4: "It's no coincidence at all.", 5: '8'}
{3: 'Vonnegut asks as a golden force field slowly materializes from his hand.'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "If... I assume you already know why I'm here...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "You have absolutely no idea what you're doing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "There's still time. Are you sure you won't cooperate with me?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No.', 3: '23', 4: "Let's hear what you have to say.", 5: '21'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Your expression betrays you. You're just trying to coax my plans out of me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'I should have just dissolved you into the Red Tide when I had the chance.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Whatever Vonnegut's plan might be, his sudden appearance at Zero-point Reactor 1 doesn't bode well."}
{3: 'Vonnegut scoffs, a cold laugh escaping him as he suddenly unleashes his force field.'}
{3: "Lucia's Pyro Katana is drawn. She blocks the attack with the flat of her blade, but as the dust settles, the Agent has vanished."}
